name: Restore Factory Setting
description: W/o Choose "Warehouse" safety code first and then Set "1"

name: Clear Data
description: W/o Reset inverter accumulated data like E-total, E-day, error log running data etc.

name: Restart
description: W/o Inverter will recheck and reconnect to utility again. Inverter does not shutdown.

description: R/W total PV production energy from the installation date

description: R/W total PV production energy of the day

description: R/W accumulated exporting energy to Grid from the installation date

description: R/W accumulated operation hours from the installation date

description: R/W accumulated exporting energy to Grid of the day

description: R/W accumulated energy imported from Grid from the installation date

description: R/W accumulated energy imported from Grid of the day

description: R/W accumulated load consumption energy from the installation date, not include backup load

description: R/W accumulated load consumption energy of the day, not include backup load

description: R/W accumulated energy charged to Battery from the installation date, not from BMS

description: R/W accumulated energy charged to Battery of the day, not from BMS

name: Energy-Battery Discharge
description: R/W accumulated energy Battery discharged, from the installation date, not from BMS

name: Energy-Discharge-Day
description: R/W accumulated energy Battery discharged, of the day, not from BMS

name: Safety Country
description: R/W safety code for inverter Refer to Table 8-21

name: ISO Limit
description: R/W Isolation protection threshold for the inverter

name: PV Start Voltage
description: R/W start up PV Voltage of the inverter

name: Enable MPPT Shadow Scan
description: R/W set "1" to activate "Shadow Scan" functtion

name: Auto Start Backup
description: R/W set "1" to  activate "Auto Start Backup" functtion

name: Rapid Cut Off
description: R/W Rapid shutdown to switch grid-connected systems to off-grid operation

name: Derate Rate(VDE)
description: R/W decrease the load,only can set to 70%, only for German

name: Three Phase Unbalanced Output
description: R/W set "1" to activate. After activated, All power needs to be turned off and restarted

name: ARC Self Check
description: W/o only for inverters with AFCI function

name: ISO Check Mode
description: R/W  0:Normal mode 1:cancel ISO test when offGrid to onGrid

name: Off Grid To On Grid Delay
description: R/W The delay time when Grid is available

name: Off Grid Under Voltage Protect Coefficient
description: R/W If set 80%, when offGrid output Voltage less than 230*80%=184V, inverter will have the error

name: Battery Mode PV Charge Enable
description: R/W When offGrid and the Battery SOC is low, PV charge the Battery first

name: Force MircoGrid Run
description: R/W Only for MircoGrid Function inverte

name: Battery PreCharge Function
description: R/W For configuring whether the Battery comes with a pre-charge function

name: GFCI fault remove
description: W/o Write 0x050A to clear GFCI Fault

name: PV Connect Mode
description: R/W PV Connect Mode, Set 0 for each  MPPT, Set 1 for 12,34MPPT, Set 2 for 1MPPT

name: Force MircoGrid Frequence Adjust
description: R/W Only for MircoGrid Function inverter

name: Port multiplexing mode
description: R/W ESC Port multiplexing mode  (default: 0) 0: generator mode 1: Large load mode 2: indicates the normal BACKUP mode

name: Battery Charge Volaget Max
description: R/W These register set protection parameters at the inverter side. The actual operation will still follow the battery BMS limit (e.g. register 47902).

name: Battery Charge Current Max
description: R/W These register set protection parameters at the inverter side. The actual operation will still follow the battery BMS limit (e.g. register 47903).

name: Battery Discharge Voltage Min
description: R/W These register set protection parameters at the inverter side. The actual operation will still follow the battery BMS limit (e.g. register 47904).

name: Battery Discharge Current Max
description: R/W These register set protection parameters at the inverter side. The actual operation will still follow the battery BMS limit (e.g. register 47905).

name: App Work Mode Index
description: R/W 0:selfuse mode  1:off gird mode   2:backup mode 3:economic mode  4:peakshaving   5:Advanced self-use

name: Meter Check Value
description: R/o Phase status 0X0TSR 1: Correct connection 2:  Connection reserved (CT) 4: Incorrect connection 8: Wrong  phase for CT and voltage sampling 0: Not detected

name: Meter Connect Check Flag
description: R/W 0: Not open test/end test 1: Being  test  2: Wait for test

name: Log Data Enable switch
description: R/W Breakpoint Resume for Data transfering. Activated as deFault, time interval 5 minutes.

name: Data Send Interval
description: R/W Time interval for data send to cloud or EMS, default is 1 minute.

name: DRED command
description: R/W Only for Australia, Refer to Table 8-22

name: WiFi Led State
description: R/W 1: off 2: on 3: flash1x 4: flash2x 5: flash4x

name: Meter CT1 Reverse Enable
description: R/W 1:on  0:off ony for single phase Smart meter

name: Modbus TCP Without Internet
description: R/W 1: on 0: off If not connect to Internet, please set 1

name: Off Grid Set Save
description: R/W 1 Enable, restart the inverter After that, save the settings

name: Meter Target Power Offset
description: R/W negative Watt: center on import; positive Watt: center on export  maybe only ET (15-30 kW) Serie

name: Max BMS Battery Discharge Current Offline2
Grid Connect Status
description: R/o 0: Disconnetced 1: Grid normal 2: Phase Sequence Fault 3: Phase Fault 4: Grid Voltage Frequency Fault

name: Device AC type
description: R/o 0: Single-phase 1: Split- phase 2: Three-phase, Four-wire 3: Three-phase, Three-wire
